name: NO (KittenGamer85)
description:
You wake up to find yourself in a room. how do you get out? who put you in the room

the mystery is yours to solve

multiple endings and a secret ending.

huuuuuuuuuge thanks to:

Danny for helping with my ideas

Liam for making the awesome music

all those furry's out there that gave me support via the forums

aiden for giving encouragement thru this whole thing 

and my siblings and parents who believed i could do it even when i felt like quitting

thank you all, from the bottom of my heart.

please note: there will be updates with better quality(this is not a lie).

plz give feedback

thx.
